strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Cozy Dev Log' carousel format transforms dry technical updates into a narrative of growth and care. The retro RPG/Stardew Valley aesthetic makes infrastructure changes feel like upgrading a home or garden, which fits the Pollinations brand of 'soft tools'.

images.prompt: Title screen text 'DEV LOG' in chunky 8-bit font. A cozy pixel art wooden desk with a vintage computer monitor glowing softly. Outside the window is a pixelated garden with lime green (#ecf874) plants. Warm sunset lighting, lo-fi aesthetic, Stardew Valley vibes. A tiny pixel bee rests on the monitor.
images.description: Cover slide establishing the cozy dev log theme

images.prompt: Retro RPG style inventory screen showing a glowing pixel art treasure chest. Golden pixel coins spilling out softly. Text 'NOWPayments' in 8-bit font. Soft pastel background (lavender to peach gradient). Clean, chunky pixel art style like Unpacking. Warm, inviting atmosphere.
images.description: Announcing the new crypto payment integration

images.prompt: A cozy pixel art night scene. Soft pastel fireworks blooming in the sky like digital flowers. A tiny 8-bit wizard character watching. Lime green and dark purple sky gradient. Text 'DeepSeek x Fireworks' in pixel font. Magical, nostalgic, warm glow effects.
images.description: Visualizing the migration to Fireworks AI for DeepSeek

images.prompt: Pixel art gardening scene. A tiny 8-bit character watering a tidy row of blue and lime green UI windows growing like plants. Represents 'UI Polish' and 'Bug Fixes'. Soft sunlight, clean lines, wholesome vibes like A Short Hike. Text 'Fresh UI & Fixes'.
images.description: Grouping the UI updates, Reddit patches, and CI fixes

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A vintage computer on a desk with text DEV LOG. 2. A pixel treasure chest representing crypto payments. 3. Pastel fireworks in a night sky. 4. A tiny character gardening UI windows.
